column7: company_profile

Youngsan Handel is an automotive and chemical company. It also engages in various manufacturing, trading and logistics business areas. The company was established in 1999 and is based in Vienna, Austria.

Beiqi Foton Motor manufactures and sells commercial vehicles worldwide. It offers passenger vehicles, such as pickups, vans, and SUVs; generic and special light-duty trucks; and special purpose vehicles, including pneumatic/dry bulk cement tanker trucks, tanker trucks, refrigerated/insulated trucks, and rear loader garbage trucks, as well as buses. The company also provides tractors, dumpers, and flatbeds. The company was founded in 1996 and is headquartered in Beijing, China. The company operates as a subsidiary of the BAIC Group.

Albwardy Investment is a holding company founded in 1976 to aggregate various business concerns held by founder Ali Saeed Juma Albwardy. The company operates in food retailing and distribution, construction, engineering, hospitality and hotel proprietary, holding sole ownership, joint venture or stakes in equity. Headquartered in Dubai, UAE, its portfolio consists of 30 companies across the Middle East, Africa, Europe, Asia and south America.

Barrick Gold engages in the production and sale of gold, as well as related activities, such as exploration and mine development. The company has a portfolio of 25 operating mines and a pipeline of projects located in North America, South America, the Australia Pacific region, and Africa. It also produces copper and holds interests in oil and gas properties located in Canada. The company was founded in 1983 and is based in Toronto, Canada.

NIC Bank provides banking, financial, and related services in Kenya. Its deposit products include demand, call, time, fixed, current, term, and savings accounts. The company's loan portfolio comprises personal loans, commercial loans, real estate loans, agricultural loans, term loans, and overdraft. It also provides various services, including electronic banking facilities; trade finance for imports and exports; cash management products; bulk cash handling; insurance premium financing; private banking services for high net-worth customers; and automated teller machines. NIC Bank was founded in 1959 and is headquartered in Nairobi, Kenya.

NIC Bank provides banking, financial, and related services in Kenya. Its deposit products include demand, call, time, fixed, current, term, and savings accounts. The company's loan portfolio comprises personal loans, commercial loans, real estate loans, agricultural loans, term loans, and overdraft. It also provides various services, including electronic banking facilities; trade finance for imports and exports; cash management products; bulk cash handling; insurance premium financing; private banking services for high net-worth customers; and automated teller machines. NIC Bank was founded in 1959 and is headquartered in Nairobi, Kenya.

KT Corporation provides telecommunications services in South Korea. The company offers mobile voice and data telecommunication services; fixed-line telephone services, including local, domestic long-distance and international long-distance fixed-line and voice over Internet protocol telephone services, and interconnection services to other telecommunications companies; and Internet phone services.  KT Corporation was founded in 1981 and is headquartered in Seongnam, South Korea.

Switzerland-based Fracht provides logistics solutions. The company offers air freight and sea freight delivery in addition to rail, barging and trucking services. Founded in 1955, Fracht is headquartered in Basel, Switzerland.

International Workplace Group (IWG), together with its subsidiaries, provides office outsourcing services. IWG offers its services to property owners and investors, franchisees, brokers, and customers under the Regus, Regus Express, Spaces, Signature, and Open Office brands. Effective October 14, 2008, Regus Group plc became Regus plc. Regus plc was created as a holding company for Regus Group plc, to establish the company's headquarters in Luxembourg, relocating from the UK. The company was formerly known as Regus before rebranding to IWG in December 2016. In December 2016, the company relocated its head office from Luxembourg to Switzerland. IWG was established in 1989 and is based in Zug, Switzerland.

International Workplace Group (IWG), together with its subsidiaries, provides office outsourcing services. IWG offers its services to property owners and investors, franchisees, brokers, and customers under the Regus, Regus Express, Spaces, Signature, and Open Office brands. Effective October 14, 2008, Regus Group plc became Regus plc. Regus plc was created as a holding company for Regus Group plc, to establish the company's headquarters in Luxembourg, relocating from the UK. The company was formerly known as Regus before rebranding to IWG in December 2016. In December 2016, the company relocated its head office from Luxembourg to Switzerland. IWG was established in 1989 and is based in Zug, Switzerland.
China Canton Investments Ltd. operates as an investment holding company. The company was incorporated in 1995 and is based in Singapore.
BASF is a chemicals firm that specialises in plastics, performance products, functional solutions, and other areas. The company is based in Ludwigshafen, Germany, and was founded in 1865.

Al Danube Building Materials manufactures and supplies building materials for customers in Gulf Cooperation Council countries, Asia, and Africa. It offers MDF, plywood, boards, exotic timber, veneer, laminates, cladding, steel, kitchen, sanitary, glass, hardware, electrical, aluminium, doors, flooring, adhesives, tiles, ceiling, paints, edge banding, and fire solution products. The company also designs and manufactures doors for interior and exterior applications. In addition, it offers matched door frame and door architrave with matched coating services. Al Danube Building Materials was founded in 1993 and is based in Dubai, the United Arab Emirates.

Hester Biosciences manufactures, markets, and exports animal vaccines and health products in India and internationally. The company offers live vaccines for avians, swine, and large animals; inactivated vaccines for avians; and health products for avians and large animals. It also provides seroprofiling services to producers for evaluating the immune response to administered vaccines and/or to obtain evidence of flock exposure to field strains; and mastitis control programmes for the cattle, as well as offers diagnostics products. Founded in 1987, Hester Biosciences is headquartered in Ahmedabad, India.

Carrick Wealth specialises in wealth and capital management services. The company aims to help its customers preserve, protect and grow their wealth by offering a range of advisory services. Carrick Wealth was established in 2014 and is headquartered in Cape Town, South Africa.

Anheuser-Busch InBev, also known as Ab InBev, is a brewing company. It engages in the production, marketing, and distribution of beer in Latin America, North America, Europe and Asia-Pacific. It offers a portfolio of approximately 200 beer brands. The company's global brands include Budweiser, Stella Artois, and Beck's; multi-country brands consist of Leffe and Hoegaarden; and local brands comprise Bud Light, Michelob, Skol, Brahma, Antarctica, Quilmes, Jupiler, Hasseroder, Klinskoye, Sibirskaya Korona, Chernigivske, Harbin and Sedrin. Established in 1366, the company is headquartered in Leuven, Belgium.
Seedstars is a venture capital firm and accelerator specialising in startups and early-stage investments. The company was founded in 2012 and is based in Carouge, Switzerland.

Associated British Foods engages in the manufacturing and trading of consumer goods. It operates through the following business segments: grocery, sugar, agriculture, ingredients and retail. The company also manages subsidiaries including Wander and Primark. Associated British Foods was established in 1935 and is headquartered in London, UK.
City Lodge operates hotels targeted primarily towards the business community. The company was established in 1985 and is headquartered in Johannesburg, South Africa.
